title: How to download music on Amazon music - Quora

response.answer_text: Instead of downloading Amazon music in the App, I download the Amazon music to my Android local collection, which make it as well playable on other music app. To download it on your Android native music app, I use TuneCable Amazon music Recorder. Convert the Amazon songs to MP3 format. This is a universal format thay fitting may different ways. It as well provided AAC, FLAC, WAV formats to convert.And all your downloading will be saved locally. So this is the main difference to the download privilege by Amazon app. This is how it make:After running TuneCable Amazon Recoreder, click 'Open Amazon Web Player' at the incoming homepage where you can see a build-in Amazon Web Player entrance. Then tap into it to sign in your Prime or Unlimited Amazon account. 2. Tap the Settings switch upper right the menu. Select the output format (MP3, AAC, FLAC, WAV) you want to convert. Following, customize the output quality (128kbps, 192kbps, 256kbps), local path and folder on computer, and the music titles orderd by Artist, Album, Artist/Album, Album/Artist. It is better to give a catchy name on your local folder, so you can find them in a minute.  3. Choose a song, a playlist or an artist, then click (Click to add) button to import the Amazon you need to convert and download. Then click 'Convert' button to proceed the conversion.  4. As long as it all done, navigate to Amazon Recorder converted history (History) section to check for your converted Amazon Music files. To go into the files in local path, tap the folder icon then you can be guide to the converted songs on your computer. Now, you can play them with your Window Media player. 5. And you finally use a Copy and Paste way to transfer the music to your phone or other audio player. All these songs will be synced to the local Android folder. Now it so easy to play on your phone! You can also put the converted songs to a USB flash disk and play them on your car!

Amazon Music is a excellent platform. When I meet the wonderful songs, I always want to save the songs which I can listen offline. To download music from Amazon, I have tried Tunecable and Tunepat. They can cancel limits from Amazon Unlimited. Both of them can perfectly download music from Amazon but Tunepat is cheaper. So I will recommend Tunepat. Hope it can help you.
